title: Collaborative problem-solving through understanding
author: Migration Script
description: Transform conflicts into collaborations by separating people from problems and focusing on underlying needs rather than stated positions

core_principle_translations.en: Understanding others' interests creates better solutions than defending positions

core_principle_translations.fr: Comprendre les intérêts des autres crée de meilleures solutions que défendre des positions

learning_essence: Transform conflicts into collaborations by separating people from problems and focusing on underlying needs rather than stated positions
